core_prompt: Design an app icon symbol as one thick ring with a single offset cut. No extra elements. The cut placement must make it ownable and instantly recognizable.
full_prompt:
Design an app icon symbol as one thick ring with a single offset cut. No extra elements. The cut placement must make it ownable and instantly recognizable.

single logo mark, flat vector, geometric precision, centered composition, white background, no text, no wordmark, no mockup, no shadows, no gradients unless specified, no photorealism, high contrast, export-ready brand symbol. avoid: 3D, bevel, shadow, mockup, gradient overload, tiny details, photorealism, watermark, extra symbols, letters beyond intended mark.

core_prompt: Design one bold rounded monolith shape with one clean geometric bite removed from the edge. Keep silhouette extremely simple and memorable.
full_prompt:

core_prompt: Design a rounded square symbol with one centered circular aperture removed. No secondary details. Prioritize home-screen legibility.
